group_1.textRight: Good morning.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, good morning! We’re looking forward to @working with you.

group_1.textCenter: This is one of Yachiyo’s friends. Can she stay and @watch the action today?

group_1.textLeft: Of course! It’s not a problem.

group_1.textRight: Thank you very much! I’m Tsuruno Yui!

group_1.textLeft: Haha! Well, aren't you full of energy.
Oh, I don’t know if we need introductions but...
These are the student volunteers you’ll be @working with, and the one and only Sayu-Sayu.

group_1.textRight: Oh my...

group_1.textLeft: I'm looking forward to working with you!

group_1.textCenter: I hear that you all already know each other.
We have some time before the meeting, @so please make yourself comfortable.

group_1.textRight: I heard Sayuki would be here, but to think @even Ria and Mayu were scouted...

group_1.textLeft: Wha… You actually remembered my name?!

group_1.textRight: I saw you in the latest issue of “BiBi”.
I see… So you do your own makeup? @You should show me your tricks sometime.

group_1.textLeft: S-sure..! I-I’d love to!
(This is the first time Yachiyo has called me by @my name...)

group_1.textRight: I can’t believe Yachiyo is acknowledging @your talents...
Good job, Ria!
Are you guys gonna have parts in @the drama, too?

group_1.textLeft: N-no! No way!
We’re here to help Yachiyo and Sayuki with their costumes and makeup.
As well as preparing lunches and doing errands @for the film crew!

group_1.textRight: Isn’t that right, Ria... [chara:303201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:303201:cheek_0][chara:303201:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:303201:lipSynch_1]Ria?
That's some grin...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:301001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
(Wha…! That’s not…!)
(She’s my greatest rival, and here I am acting @like some starstruck fan!)
Ahem...
That's right, they didn't have a role that was @suitable for me...
So, I’m gonna make you look crazy good on @screen. You better be prepared!

group_1.textRight: I’m counting on you. We’ll look forward to it.

group_1.textLeft: Hee hee!

group_1.textRight: ...Hmm? Is she in a good mood or something?

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* That may be the case.

group_1.textRight: ...huh?

group_1.textLeft: What's up? You seem really lost in thought about something...

group_1.textRight: I was thinking about when Seira and the others @made their movie.
You could say I’m a bit worried.
With so many Magical Girls working on this @show, something could happen again.

group_1.textLeft: Wait! Is something bad going to happen?!

group_1.textRight: It's not a done deal yet. Although, we should @be careful.
Yeah...just something to keep in mind.
Mm… But Master, you still look so worried!
Okay then! In times like this, we should do @Tsuruno's patented warm-up together!

group_1.textLeft: Right here and now?

group_1.textRight: C’mon, cheer up!
We’ll be a-okay even no matter what! You’ve @got the Mightiest Magical Girl on your side!
I’ll do whatever it takes to protect my Master!
I’ll fix everything in a snap! Yep, yep!

group_1.textLeft: I swear...
...There’s nothing to be done if it’s a family @emergency.
Do you think you can find a replacement?

group_1.textRight: I'm not sure yet, but I'm starting to look.
...Wait! That girl...

group_1.textLeft: Hm? The one that came to check out the studio?
Oh, her name's Tsuruno Yui. She's a friend of @Miss Nanami.

group_1.textRight: She’s a very cheerful girl...

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah, let's ask her. She's perfect for the role @of Chizuru.
I'm sorry to keep you waiting, girls. @This is the director.
I'm the scriptwriter and here's the historical @researcher for this project.

group_1.textRight: ...It’s very nice to meet you. So, um... well...
Miss Yui.

group_1.textLeft: Um, yes…?

group_1.textRight: The role of Chizuru… Would you be willing to @co-star with Miss Nanami and play it?
We’d really appreciate it!

group_1.textLeft: Wait a minute! The co-star....
Isn’t Yachiyo’s co-star Sayu-Sayu? @I mean... Sayuki?
My role is the Magpie, don’tcha know?

group_1.textRight: Mag...pie? Like a bird? Or is that the name @of a person?

group_1.textLeft: Magpie as in a bird. It’s a character who’s @more like the show's mascot.
But I heard someone from the local theater @company would be playing Chizuru...

group_1.textRight: ....Oh, I’m sorry. I should have started from the beginning…
The girl who was going to play Chizuru had to @leave on short notice.
We’re pretty desperate for a replacement.

group_1.textLeft: Is that so? I see...

group_1.textRight: Um… Well… Miss Yui fits the image we @had perfectly!
I’m sorry for the sudden request, but could you @please consider it?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm, a co-starring role with Master...
